title: Grilled pork chop with crisp black pudding, cider sauce and greens
description: Try this great scrumpy cider and apple sauce with pork chops, greens and deep-fried black pudding.
ingredients: 4 Bramley apples, peeled and cut into chunks
1 kg/2lb 4oz bone-in pork loin, French trimmed, cut into four thick chops
1 head of spring greens, sliced thickly
